let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? " ":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\dÂç∑ÈÉ®Á´†ËäÇÂõû.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `Êõ¥Êñ∞Êó∂Èó¥: ${chapter.uT} Â≠óÊï∞: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// Ëé∑ÂèñÂåÖÂê´<li>ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑ<div>ÂÖÉÁ¥†
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// Â∞ÜdivsËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫Êï∞ÁªÑ‰ª•‰æøÊéíÂ∫è
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// ÊåâÁÖßdata-idÂ±ûÊÄßÂØπdivArrayËøõË°åÊéíÂ∫è
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// ÈÅçÂéÜÊéíÂ∫èÂêéÁöÑdivArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // Ëé∑ÂèñÂΩìÂâçdiv‰∏ãÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ<li>ÂÖÉÁ¥†
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ‰ΩøÁî®data-idÂ±ûÊÄß
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {

};
